pkgmetadata.longdescription: Call Real Time APIs from Data Gov Singapore // A wrapper for the Data.gov.sg developer resources, which provide real time and historical information, ranging from carpark availability to weather forecasts. The functions makes the API calls for a given date and time, before returning the relevant information in a data frame. All APIs are supported, less the IPOS one which is not returning any data. Relevant information can be found here https://data.gov.sg/developer.
